text: I'm writing a spider in Python to crawl a site.
Trouble is, I need to examine about 2.5 million pages, so I could really use some help making it optimized for speed.
What I need to do is examine the pages for a certain number, and if it is found to record the link to the page.
The spider is very simple, it just needs to sort through a lot of pages.
I'm completely new to Python, but have used Java and C++ before.
I have yet to start coding it, so any recommendations on libraries or frameworks to include would be great.
Any optimization tips are also greatly appreciated.
